title: Kitzur Ba'al HaTurim on Leviticus
text: And on the Eighth day, Moses summoned. The numerical value of this phrase is equal to that of It was on the day of Rosh Chodesh Nissan.  Moshe said, "Because I resisted for seven days at the [Burning] Bush, I merited to serve as a Kohen for only seven [days]
